links.title: Porsche's Tesla-Challenging Electric Car Will Arrive In 2019, Will Be a 'Steal' at Under $100K
links.description: Porsche chairman Oliver Blume revealed at the 2017 Frankfurt Motor Show that the company's Mission E electric concept sedan from the 2015 show has been approved for production and will arrive at the 2019 edition of the biennial show.

links.title: General Motors' Chevy Bolt Just Beat Tesla's Model X
links.description: General Motors (NYSE: GM) said it delivered 3,227 Chevrolet Bolt electric vehicles (EVs) in the United States in December. It was the best monthly sales total yet for the Bolt -- and the ninth month in a row in which the Bolt's U.S. sales were up from the month prior.

links.title: Elon Musk teases a Supercharger station with a drive-in movie theater and more surprises
links.description: For as revolutionary and forward-thinking as Tesla's vehicles are, one of the smartest things Tesla did to boost EV adaptation was the rollout of an all-encompassing network of Supercharger stations. Not too long ago, range anxiety was often highlighted as one of the key reasons why otherwise interested buyers were unwilling to pull the trigger on a Tesla vehicle.
